Class AbstractBrick

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.bricks.AbstractBrick
All Implemented Interfaces:
Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
IBrick, JBrick, LBrick, OBrick, SBrick, TBrick, ZBrick
public abstract class AbstractBrick extends Object implements Brick
Base class for all tetromino bricks.

Each concrete brick only defines its rotation matrices. Common behaviour such as storing the rotations and returning a defensive copy is handled here, which removes a lot of duplication from the individual brick classes.

    private final List<int[][]>

  • Field Details

    • shapeMatrix

      private final List<int[][]> shapeMatrix
      Stores the sequence of 2D matrices representing the brick's rotation states. Index 0 is the default rotation, Index 1 is 90 degrees, etc.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractBrick

      protected AbstractBrick(int[][]... rotations)
      Constructs a new brick with the specified rotation matrices.
      Parameters:
      rotations - Variable arguments of 2D arrays, where each array represents a distinct rotation state of the tetromino.

  • Method Details

    • getShapeMatrix

      public List<int[][]> getShapeMatrix()
      Retrieves the list of rotation matrices for this brick.

      Returns a deep copy of the list to ensure the internal state of the brick cannot be mutated by external classes.

      Specified by:
      getShapeMatrix in interface Brick
      Returns:
      A list of 2D integer arrays representing the shape rotations.
